title: Moments that occur only in the first two months of marriage.
content: No matter how long a courtship period you had with your partner before marriage or the number of years you have dated your lover, life takes a turn once you get married. title: Sleeping Next To Someone Who Snores Is Bad For Your Mental Health: Study Says
content:
Living with a partner is a great feeling, but it doesn't feel so great if you are a light sleeper and your partner is a snorer. In fact, it can cause mental illness and dampen your relationship with the real bad.

title: Marriage with chubby women makes you 10 times happier, says a study
content: Everyone, brace yourself! The revelations of recent research have created a buzz in the world of love and relationships. title: Best age to get married, according to your zodiac sign
content:

title: Are Sexless Marriages More Common Than We Think?
content:
How much sex should married couples have? Experts sound off on sexless marriage and long-term love.
